name: Myrmex Hollow
description:
This is the first original game I've ever made. The backstory is about a giant car-sized race of ants breaking the surface from deep underground and running a rampage through the countryside, and the game is about a lone hero descending into the nest to destroy the queen and hopefully put a stop to the invasion.

This game probably could have been made by an experienced game designer in a couple of weeks, but as I was basically learning how to programme from scratch it took me several months.

I've written a full self critical review of the game and it's development process on my own blog viewable here
